title: What does capture mean on my cell phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: Normally it means screen capture or screen shot, it is how you are able to technically take a picture of what is in your screen. Most of the time it is to share information or capture something you are not able to save directly from a site. It is also a good way to share an error message that might pop up on your phone to send to i.t.
